member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Contensive.Addon.aoFormWizard3.My.Resources.Resources.Culture

member.name: P:Contensive.Addon.aoFormWizard3.My.Resources.Resources.FormWizard
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to

member.name: M:Contensive.Addon.aoFormWizard3.Controllers.InstanceIdController.getSettingsGuid(Contensive.BaseClasses.CPBaseClass,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: return the instanceId for a design block. It should be an document argument set when the addon is dropped on the page. If the addon is created with a json string it should be included as an argument If it is not included, the page id is used to make a string If no instanceId can be created a blank is returned and should NOT be used. If returnHtmlMessage is non-blank, add it to the html
member.param: A name of the design block. This must be unqiue for each type of design block (i.e. text, tile, etc)

member.name: M:Contensive.Addon.aoFormWizard3.Controllers.genericController.encodeMinDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary: if date is invalid, set to minValue

member.name: M:Contensive.Addon.aoFormWizard3.Controllers.genericController.getShortDateString(System.DateTime)
member.summary: if valid date, return the short date, else return blank string

member.name: M:Contensive.Addon.aoFormWizard3.Controllers.genericController.encodeStyleHeight(System.String)
member.summary: convert string into a style "height: {styleHeight};", if value is numeric it adds "px"

member.name: M:Contensive.Addon.aoFormWizard3.Controllers.genericController.encodeStyleBackgroundImage(Contensive.BaseClasses.CPBaseClass,System.String)
member.summary: convert string into a style "background-image: url(backgroundImage)

member.name: M:Contensive.Addon.aoFormWizard3.Models.Db.baseModel.getUploadPath``1(System.String)
member.summary: Temporary method to create a path for an uploaded. First, try the texrt value in the field. If it is empty, use this method to create the path, append the filename to the end and save it to the field, and save the file there. This path starts with the tablename and ends with a slash.
